subject: Re: Dental Advice Network | 2x Growth ideas
preview: @allieB Closing this ticket, as the original inquiry has now been resolved.  See related ticket here: https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/3166924794/181689?viewId=8874269

full_threads.body:
@allieB Closing this ticket, as the original inquiry has now been resolved.

See related ticket here: https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/3166924794/181689?viewId=8874269

Ticket/Issue Summary

Steven requested several updates across the Dental Advice Network website, including:
  • Updating terminology from “subscribers” to “members” across the site.
  • Updating various Subscribe buttons and labels to Join Now and related phrasing.
  • Renaming “Subscribers Agreement” to Members Agreement.
  • Adding a new Journal Club item under Resources.
  • Uploading and displaying a Vimeo video in the Learning Centre.
  • Clarifying the location of the uploaded video on the website.
During the process, an access issue occurred with the Vimeo link due to privacy settings, which was later resolved.

Action Plan

  • Updated all required terminology site-wide from “subscribers” to “members.”
  • Replaced all Subscribe-related buttons and labels per Steven’s instructions:
    • Subscribe Now → Join Now
    • Subscribe (Pricing header) → Join the DAN family
    • Homepage CTAs updated accordingly.
  • Updated payment page checkbox to reference the Member Agreement.
  • Renamed Subscribers Agreement page to Members Agreement and updated internal references.
  • Uploaded the Vimeo video to the backend file manager once access was corrected.
  • Added the video to the Learning Centre so it is now visible to members.
  • Added Journal Club under Resources, between Learning Centre and Prescription Instructions (newly renamed).
  • Provided screenshots and confirmation throughout.

Conclusion

All requested updates have now been completed:
  • Terminology changes: Done
  • Button & label replacements: Done
  • Members Agreement rename: Done
  • Journal Club addition: Done
  • Vimeo upload & Learning Centre placement: Done
A final confirmation email was sent to Steven letting him know that the video has now been added to the public-facing Learning Centre page and inviting him to advise on any title/description adjustments.
The ticket is fully actioned and ready to be closed unless further changes are requested.

That's great.

There is one other change that would be good.

The first two videos in the Media library (Episode 1 and Episode 2) are recordings of past webinars. Can we divide the medial library into two sections: 1. Previous Webinars and 2. Focussed Presentations - this is where we would put the latest video. We are so excited by how amazing the website is becoming!

I have just recorded another Dento-Legal Lesson that I will upload soon to Vimeo and then let you know.

Thanks again.

You truly are amazing.

Steve

Hi Steven,

Apologies for the mix-up, and thank you for clarifying.

It looks like there was a small misunderstanding with terminology, we interpreted "Media Library" as the website's backend storage system. So, the video is currently uploaded and safe in the system's file manager,

However, we’ve now also added the video to the Learning Centre page so it’s visible to members under the appropriate section.

You can view the Learning Centre Media Library Here: Link

Please let us know if you’d like to adjust the video title, or if there’s anything else you’d like us to tweak. We’re happy to make any changes to ensure it’s exactly how you want it.

Ah, thanks for clarifying!

I think there was a slight mix-up on terminology, we interpreted "Media Library" as the website's backend storage system. So, the video is currently uploaded and safe in the system's file manager, but we haven't placed it on a public-facing page yet.

We are more than happy to get that live for you in the Learning Centre right away!

Could u let us know
  • Yada

Thanks.

I can't find the video in the Media section of the Learning Centre.

Where is it on the website?

Cheers

Steve

Hi Steven,

Thanks for updating the Vimeo video settings and providing the new link. Just a quick update, we’ve now successfully accessed the video and uploaded it to the Media Library.

View the media link here: Media Link

In addition, we’ve completed the recent requests you shared:

  • Renamed the “Subscribers Agreement” page to Members Agreement and updated internal references accordingly.
  • Added Journal Club under Resources on the Members homepage, positioned between Learning Centre and the renamed Prescription Instructions section.

Everything should now be live and updated as requested. Please let us know if there’s anything else you’d like us to adjust, always happy to help!

The link I have for it now is: https://vimeo.com/1145132944?share=copy&fl=sv&fe=ci

Steve

Hi,

I checked the other videos that are on Vimeo that you have previously been able to access. They were both set to 'Private but embeddable', whereas this video was set to 'Private'. I have made it 'Private but embeddable' like the others.

Please let me know if you can access now.

Steve

Hi Steven,

Hope you’re doing well!

Thanks for sending through the Vimeo link and for providing the additional updates — we’ve noted everything.

We wanted to let you know that the video link seems to still not be working on our end. To help move things along, you could either:
  • Double-check that the video is set to public or unlisted so it can be accessed for upload, or
  • Alternatively, provide the exact video title & uploader name, and we can try searching for it directly on Vimeo.

Regarding the new requests, we’ve taken note:
  • Members Agreement Page: We’ll rename the “Subscribers Agreement” page to Members Agreement and update the internal references accordingly.
  • Journal Club Section: We can add Journal Club under Resources on the Members homepage, positioned between Learning Centre and the renamed Prescription Instructions.

Once we have the video clarified, we’ll proceed to upload it and complete these updates.

Always happy to help, and please feel free to let us know if there’s anything else you’d like adjusted!

Thanks.

That's great.

Here is the link for the video: https://vimeo.com/1145132944?fl=tl&fe=ec

Hopefully that will work this time.

Yes, rename the page to Members Agreement.

I have also been asked if we can have Journal Club under Resources on the Members homepage. It would go between 'Learning Centre' and 'Prescription Examples' which should be renamed 'Prescription Instructions'. I have had comments that it is difficult to find.

Kind Regards

Dr Steven Parker

Hi Steven,

Hope you’re having a great day!  Just an update, we've gone ahead and updated the labels across the site as requested:

  • On the Homepage & Pricing Page Subscribe Now button now reads Join Now.
  • On the Pricing page, Header has been replaced with Join the DAN family.
  • On the homepage, both instances of Subscribe now to get access have been updated to Join now to get access.
  • The Payment Page checkbox now says: I acknowledge that I have read and accepted the Member Agreement.

We've provided screenshots attached for reference.

Before we continue with the remaining items, we just need of clarification to make sure everything aligns perfectly with your vision:

  • The Vimeo video link isn’t opening on our end. Would you mind sending it through again so we can upload it to the Media Library?

  • About the Subscribers Agreement page: Since you're shifting terminology from subscribers to members, would you like us to rename this page to Members Agreement?

Once we have these, we’ll complete the remaining updates right away.

Always happy to help, and please feel free to send through anything else you’d like refined!

full_threads.body:
Hi Steven,

Thanks for sharing the updates and detailed instructions. We’ve taken note of all the requested changes and terminology updates.

Here’s a summary of the items our team will be working on:

Terminology & Text Updates

  • Update all references from “subscribers” to “members” across the site, including FAQ pages.
  • Change buttons and headings as requested:
    • “Subscribe Now” → “Join Now”
    • Pricing page “Subscribe” → “Join the DAN family”
    • Homepage “Subscribe now to get access” → “Join now to get access” (top and bottom)
  • Payment page checkbox → “I acknowledge that I have read and accepted the Member Agreement.”
  • Add the video from the Vimeo link to the Media Library.

LinkedIn & Member Badge Updates

  • LinkedIn: To help enhance the website, you could edit the Company/Organization field in your LinkedIn profile experience to link to the official Dental Advice Network Company Page. Doing this will increase visibility, ensure the page receives proper recognition, and can also help with SEO by strengthening your organization’s online presence.

    See a tutorial here: Edit LinkedIn Experience - Video Tutorial

  • Member Badge: We’ve designed a simple badge that partners can add to their websites to link back to DAN, helping improve SEO. The badge images/icons are included in the link below for you to share with your partners.

    • View the link: Badge Image/Icons

Our team is on it and will update you as soon as all requested changes are live. If you notice anything else in the meantime, don’t hesitate to reach out — we’re always happy to help!

Hi,

I like the Instagram link on the home page.

We had a meeting of all consultants last night and the feeling was that we should have 'members' rather than 'subscribers'. I have changed all the referencers to 'subscribers' I could find in the FAQ and changed them to 'members'.

Can you please change the 'Subscribe Now' button to 'Join Now' and change 'Subscribe' at the top of the Pricing page to "Join the DAN family" and on the homepage change the 'Subscribe now to get access' button to 'Join now to get access' at the top and bottom of this page. Also, need to change the text on the checkbox on the payment page to 'I acknowledge that I have read and accepted the Member Agreement. *

Also, please add this video to the Media Library: https://vimeo.com/1145132944?fl=ip&fe=ec

Thanks

Dr Steven Parker

Hi Steven,

Happy Tuesday!

I’m looping in Andy regarding your recent request. Our team is working on implementing the approved updates and will ensure everything is set up correctly.

Just to recap Andy’s suggestions to help grow DAN’s visibility:

  • Instagram Feed Integration: To be implemented on your homepage above the "Upcoming Web Events".
  • Member Badge: Create a simple badge for partners to put on their site that links back to yours (great for SEO).
  • LinkedIn: Ensure the "Dental Advice Network" Company Page is set up and linked to your profile for better search visibility.

We’ll update you as soon as the feed is live and working smoothly. If you have any questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out — we’re always happy to help!

action.text: Marcelo Meneses changed the customer to Steven Parker
Allie Borcena assigned to Marcelo Meneses

full_threads.body:
Hi Steven,

It was great to chat with you earlier.

I have looped in @Wolf IQ Support Team here to implement the Instagram Feed integration on your homepage (above "Upcoming Web Events").

As mentioned, we will take care of this on the house.

Here are the two suggestions to help grow DAN's visibility:
  • Member Badge: Create a simple badge for partners to put on their site that links back to yours (great for SEO).
  • LinkedIn: Ensure the "Dental Advice Network" Company Page is set up and linked to your profile for better search visibility.
Thanks again,
Andy
--

Andy Crebar
